config.name: README
config.content:
README

Dashboard Requirements

Dashboard Token : rewstDeviceName

  • Dashboard Token Value :app.rewst.io OR rewst device name in Logicmonitor

LM Logs Alert Requirements (Optional)

LM Logs Pipeline Name : Automation

  • LM Logs Pipeline Query : syslog_identifier="Rewst_Workflow_Execution"
  • Display description :Syslog via API

#1 LM Logs Pipeline Alert Condition Name : Rewst - Workflow Execution Failed

  • Pipeline : Automation
  • LM Logs Pipeline Alerting Condition : execution_status="failed"
  • Alert trigger conditions : For each matching log
  • Alert clear conditions : Clear after 3 days
  • Auto-clear after acknowledge : true
  • LM Logs Log Metadata Fields To Include : See Below

#2 LM Logs Pipeline Alert Condition Name : Rewst - Workflow Execution Canceled

  • Pipeline : Automation
  • LM Logs Pipeline Alerting Condition : execution_status="canceled"
  • Alert trigger conditions : For each matching log
  • Alert clear conditions : Clear after 3 days
  • Auto-clear after acknowledge : true
  • LM Logs Log Metadata Fields To Include : See Below

#3 LM Logs Pipeline Alert Condition Name : Rewst - Workflow Execution Canceling

  • Pipeline : Automation
  • LM Logs Pipeline Alerting Condition : execution_status="canceling"
  • Alert trigger conditions : For each matching log
  • Alert clear conditions : Clear after 3 days
  • Auto-clear after acknowledge : true
  • LM Logs Log Metadata Fields To Include : See Below

LM Logs Log Metadata Fields To Include : (#1, #2, and #3)

execution_url

execution_status

org_name

workflow_name

workflow_url


LmLogs Queries

Executions - Success By Workflow - Last 24 Hours

syslog_identifier= "Rewst_Workflow_Execution" | parse "workflow_name = *" as workflow | count by workflow | sort by _count desc

Executions - Failures by Org w/URL - Last 24 Hours

syslog_identifier= "Rewst_Workflow_Execution" and execution_status="failed" | parse "execution_url = *" as url | parse "workflow_name = *" as workflow | parse "org_name = *" as org | count by created_at, org, workflow, url | sort by created_at desc

Executions - By Status - Last 24 Hours

syslog_identifier= "Rewst_Workflow_Execution"  | parse "execution_status = *" as status | count by status | sort by _count desc

Executions - By Org_Name - Last 24 Hours

syslog_identifier= "Rewst_Workflow_Execution" | parse "org_name = *" as org | count by org | sort by _count desc

Workflow Updates - By Date, User, Workflow, Org, Crate, SyncStatus - Last 24 Hours

syslog_identifier="Rewst_Workflow_Updated" | parse "updated_by = *" as user |  parse "workflow_url = *" as url | count by is_sync, type, workflow_name, crate_name, org_name, user, updated_at, url | sort by updated_at desc

Workflow Updates - By User - Last 24 Hours

syslog_identifier="Rewst_Workflow_Updated" | parse "updated_by = *" as user | count by user | sort by _count desc

Workflow Updates - By Crate - Last 24 Hours

syslog_identifier="Rewst_Workflow_Updated" | parse "crate_name = *" as crate | count by crate | sort by _count desc
